function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of vaccine for COVID-19","Impact":"Continued spread and impact of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Accelerate vaccine development and distribution, implement health measures","Technologies":"Vaccine development technologies, health monitoring and tracking systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Dependency on advanced technology","Impact":"Reliance on technology for disease reduction","Mitigation":"Diversify mitigation strategies, ensure access to technology for all populations","Technologies":"Advanced medical and monitoring technologies, digital health solutions","People":"General population, healthcare providers","Owner":"Government, technology companies"},{"Description":"Insufficient governance solutions","Impact":"Ineffective response to social and economic disruption","Mitigation":"Improve governance models, enhance emergency management plans","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure, ICT for emergency management","People":"Urban residents, public sector employees","Owner":"Government, city authorities"}]}
